modmenu.descriptionTranslation.compressy:
Squish ALL your blocks into tiny packages! Compress ANY block up to 32 times!

§6Features:§r
• Compress 9 blocks into 1 (up to 32 levels!)
• Works with ANY block - automatic mod support via block tags
• Standard crafting recipes - compatible with automation mods
• Two versions: FULL (placeable with visual overlays) and LITE (inventory-only)
• Visual tier indicators (Roman numerals + darkening effect)
• Fully configurable via ModMenu or config file
• Zero performance overhead in LITE mode

§aUse §e/cblocks help§a to get started!
modmenu.summaryTranslation.compressy: Compress ANY block up to 32 times! Turn 9 blocks into 1, then keep going! Uses Minecraft's block tags for automatic mod support.
